grant_access_data.description: Access data object supplied in the body of the get disk access operation.

durationinseconds.description: Time duration in seconds until the SAS access expires.

subscription_id.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group.

disk_name.description: The name of the managed disk that is being created. The name can't be changed after the disk is created. Supported characters for the name are a-z, A-Z, 0-9 and _. The maximum name length is 80 characters.
